name: progprnv
bio:
Cybersecurity Researcher & Likes to crack codes rather than building one!!

/ C / Python / C++ / Js / Bash / Html

top_projects.name: Interncrow
top_projects.description: Tensed about your job or career? Welcome InternCrow - Your Minimalistic Free Job Finder Tool

top_projects.name: Chatter-Hacktoberfest_2024
top_projects.description: Chatter is a minimalist web application designed for users to post and view messages easily. Built with PHP, it allows anyone to share their thoughts without the need for user accounts or complicated security features.

top_projects.name: SecMySIte
top_projects.description: SEC-MY_SITE is a Flask-based web app designed to scan domains for essential security headers like Content-Security-Policy (CSP), CSRF tokens, CORS protection, and host header validation. It provides an easy-to-use interface for users to input domains and receive insights on their security posture, helping identify potential vulnerabilities.

top_projects.name: Hackathon-Winning-Tips-Tricks
top_projects.description: Must need repo to level up on Hackathon Events!! Master the art of problem solving and ideating projects. Be sure to use these tips nd tricks on your next hackathon!!!

top_projects.name: Aircrack-ng-144p
top_projects.description: Aircrack-Ng-144p lite v0.1.1 is a C-based Wi-Fi network scanner tool that scans and displays basic information about nearby Wi-Fi networks, including SSID, BSSID, channel, and signal strength.

top_projects.name: Secure-KTU-Project_Davinci
top_projects.description: Project Davinci, led by Government Engineering College (GEC) Thrissur, focuses on "Secure-KTU," enhancing the security of the KTU website. The project assesses vulnerabilities per NCIIPC RVDP standards, addressing threats like data breaches and unauthorized access, ensuring safer online services.

top_projects.name: reconP
top_projects.description: reconP is a powerful subdomain discovery and verification tool that integrates multiple APIs to gather and check the status of subdomains for a given target domain.

top_projects.name: scope
top_projects.description: SCOPE [Subdomain Cache Observation, Poisoning & Evaluation] is a simple, yet powerful tool designed to help you find and test vulnerabilities in subdomains that might be exposed to cache poisoning attacks. If a website isn't properly handling cache, it could lead to security issues where malicious content gets stored and served to users.

Kalyani.summary: The Kalyani repository has seen significant updates with multiple push events occurring on December 21, 2024. These updates include modifications to script.js, styles.css, and index.html, along with the creation and deletion of a CNAME file. Additionally, a readme.md file was created, indicating an effort to improve the project's documentation. These activities suggest active development and refinement of the project's core files and configuration.

ASCII-Kuttappan.summary: The ASCII-Kuttappan repository experienced a series of updates on December 20, 2024, primarily focusing on the app.py file with multiple push events. There was also an update to the readme.md file and an adjustment to the requirements.txt file, suggesting ongoing development and dependency management within the project.

devb.io.summary: The devb.io repository, owned by sunithvs, has been active with pull requests aimed at enhancing the project's reliability and flexibility. A notable update includes the implementation of dynamic port configuration through environment variables in the Dockerfile, improving the application's flexibility. Additionally, error handling for the GitHub profile fetcher was implemented, contributing to a more robust and user-friendly experience.

profile_summary:
Progprnv is a highly skilled cybersecurity researcher with a strong foundation in programming languages such as C, C++, and Python. With a keen interest in cracking codes, progprnv brings a unique perspective to the field of cybersecurity, leveraging expertise in languages like Javascript, Bash, and Html to stay ahead of emerging threats. As a seasoned developer with 43 public repositories, progprnv has consistently demonstrated the ability to design, develop, and deploy innovative solutions that showcase technical prowess and attention to detail.

As a respected member of the development community with 69 followers, progprnv has established a reputation for reliability, expertise, and collaborative spirit. With a passion for cybersecurity research and a talent for coding, progprnv is well-equipped to tackle complex challenges and drive meaningful outcomes. By combining technical skills with a deep understanding of industry trends and best practices, progprnv delivers high-quality results that meet the evolving needs of the cybersecurity landscape, making them a valuable asset to any organization or project seeking to stay ahead of the curve in the ever-changing world of technology.
